name: Joana
descriptions: Joana is a prostitute at the Gomorrah Casino in 2281.

Joana is a prostitute who can be found dancing in Gomorrah's courtyard or in her room at one end of the second floor of the courtyard. She has a Med-X addiction, using it to deal with the loss of her lover Carlitos and sexual abuse by the Omertas lieutenant, Cachino.
* Only during the quest Bye Bye Love.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Well, what do we have here, huh? Let me guess. You've heard about the mistress who makes all your fantasies come true.

topics.topic_text: I always have what it takes.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, confident. I like that.

topics.topic_text: I... don't know, uh, what does it take?
topics.response_text: [FAILED]{Chuckles}Haha, not too bright, huh? It takes caps, honey, lots of them.

topics.topic_text: <Placeholder for Joana's Question Node - JS>
topics.response_text: All right, honey. What do you want to know?

topics.topic_text: I'd like to know more about you.
topics.response_text: Yes?

topics.topic_text: I have questions about Gomorrah.
topics.response_text: Yes?

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the Omertas?
topics.response_text: You'd best hold your tongue... friend, or someone here will take care of it, for good.

topics.topic_text: <Placeholder for Joana's Goodbyes>
topics.response_text: I'll see you soon, I'm sure.

topics.topic_text: I'll... I'm sure something good.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Honey, I've had better than just "good." And you were being so amusing...

topics.topic_text: The better question is what are *you* going to do with it.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Oh my, aren't you something else...!? I guess you'll have to see for yourself what I can do, huh?

topics.topic_text: The better question is what are *you* going to do with it.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Oh my, aren't you something else...!? I guess you'll have to see for yourself what I can do, huh?

topics.topic_text: How does a 100 caps sound?
topics.response_text: Fine. Are you ready?

topics.topic_text: How does 75 caps sound?
topics.response_text: Well... ladies are always a welcome change.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I'm short on caps right now.
topics.response_text: {Irritated Disappointment}Damn shame. Anything else I can do for you?

topics.topic_text: Actually, I'm short on caps right now.
topics.response_text: {Irritated Disappointment}Damn shame. Anything else I can do for you?

topics.topic_text: What's your story?
topics.response_text: Oh, nothing special, hon. I'm the best lay in Gomorrah, and that's all you need to know.

topics.topic_text: Do you like it here?
topics.response_text: I like that you're here, doesn't that make you happy?

topics.topic_text: What's the deal with Gomorrah?
topics.response_text: It's your paradise on this desolate earth, hon. Your troubles are gone, your pain forgotten, and your dreams come true.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about Gomorrah's clients.
topics.response_text: Everyone wants a piece of their own personal heaven. So, they come here, for hours... and hours, hon{chuckles}.

topics.topic_text: I'm here for some fun.
topics.response_text: So you've followed the call of your desires... all the way to the arms of Joana, moi. Now that you've found me, I wonder, do you have what it takes?

topics.topic_text: What's the Omertas' role in Gomorrah?
topics.response_text: They run the place as a center for all their dirty scams and extortions. Gambling, sex, drugs, they'll use whatever works to exploit your weaknesses.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about their leaders.
topics.response_text: Nero's the pack leader and Big Sal's his right hand. What Nero wants, Big Sal does. Then there's... Cachino.

topics.topic_text: I want to talk about Carlitos.
topics.response_text: What? Have you seen him? Have you talked to him?

topics.topic_text: Carlitos wants to get you out of here.
topics.response_text: I... look, we can't talk here. If you think you can help me, follow me to my room, please.

topics.topic_text: I want to talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Okay, what's on your mind?

topics.topic_text: You keep avoiding my questions. Are you bothered by them?
topics.response_text: [FAILED] I'm not, but questions bore me, hon.

topics.topic_text: Joana, you can trust me. Why are you avoiding my questions?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I... look, we can't talk here. If you think you can help me, follow me to my room, please.

topics.topic_text: You don't look good. Are you... ill or something?
topics.response_text: [FAILED] I'm not, but questions bore me, hon.

topics.topic_text: Contracted pupils, involuntary spasms... Med-X kills quickly, Joana. I can help.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I... I didn't think it showed.{Chuckles nervously}I guess that it's worse than I thought.

topics.topic_text: Trust me, I'll keep you safe.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You sound so sure. Damn it all, you better not make me regret this later.

topics.topic_text: I... don't know, but we'll figure it out.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Sorry, I can't risk our lives without more guarantees than that.

topics.topic_text: You'll never see them again, you have my word.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] To be free and with Carlitos again... Tell him that I still, I - never mind.

topics.topic_text: Don't worry, I'll tell him that you are happy to hear from him.
topics.response_text: Thank you so much for your help.

topics.topic_text: You'll just have to hope it all works out... I guess.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Sorry, I can't risk our lives without more guarantees than that.

topics.topic_text: What's the deal with Cachino?
topics.response_text: He's a filthy monster. I've been with perverted men but Cachino's done things... to me, that -

topics.topic_text: I'm ready.
topics.response_text: Okay, lay down and I'll take care of you.

topics.topic_text: What's happened to you?
topics.response_text: I'm... I don't know what's happening to me. I can't feel a goddamn thing anymore, empty and poisoned like the Wasteland.

topics.topic_text: What's Carlitos' story?
topics.response_text: He was an Omerta that... fell in love with me. They don't ever mix with people outside the "family," you know?

topics.topic_text: Cachino talked because Carlitos broke Omerta rules?
topics.response_text: Cachino doesn't give a shit about rules, only cares to feed his perversions. He lusted for me, he's done things to me.

topics.topic_text: I know Carlitos.
topics.response_text: What? Have you seen him? Have you talked to him?

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I'm not interested in this right now.
topics.response_text: {Irritated Disappointment}Damn shame. Anything else I can do for you?

topics.topic_text: I've talked to Carlitos, but not about you.
topics.response_text: What? Carlitos is alive? Please, tell him that I still love him, that I want to escape with him... please.

topics.topic_text: What if Carlitos lives?
topics.response_text: If he's alive he's long gone. The Omertas want him dead, now.

topics.topic_text: Anything...
topics.response_text: Hon, nobody's given me a free thing before. What's it going to be for you, caps, sex, straps, what?

topics.topic_text: Nothing, I'll find him for you.
topics.response_text: What? Are you... serious? Well, I'm not complaining, hon.

topics.topic_text: 200 caps would do, for now.
topics.response_text: That sounds good, hon. I hope to see you soon.

topics.topic_text: You know what I want, Joana.
topics.response_text: Yes... I know what you want. And I know how to give it to you, right now.

topics.topic_text: I want to talk about Carlitos.
topics.response_text: Yes?

topics.topic_text: So, you want me to talk to Carlitos?
topics.response_text: If you meet him, anywhere... I'd do anything to get him back and escape this hell, although I'm not keeping my hopes up.

topics.topic_text: About your problem, let's go to your room.
topics.response_text: Follow me, hon.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to talk first.
topics.response_text: All right, honey. What do you want to know?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Stay for a while, hon. Jump in bed and let me do the rest.

topics.topic_text: I have questions about you.
topics.response_text: Yes?

topics.topic_text: I have news from Carlitos.
topics.response_text: Yes?

topics.topic_text: He'll meet us in Freeside around midnight. I'll sneak you out in disguise.
topics.response_text: Okay, I got clothes I can use for that. When you give the word, I'll let the other girls know and we'll meet you at the lobby.

topics.topic_text: Are you ready to get out?
topics.response_text: I'm ready. Just give the word and we'll meet you at the lobby, in an hour.

topics.topic_text: Let's do this.
topics.response_text: Okay. See you soon.

topics.topic_text: Let's head out.
topics.response_text: It's now or never, let's go.

topics.topic_text: Let me make sure I'm ready.
topics.response_text: {Urging whisper}Whatever you've got to do, do it quick!
